(You've received a letter from Dougal.

In an effort to bolster our fighting forces, we're encouraging soldiers to enchant their weapons. Return to {@Rgn:63009} in {@Rgn:63001} at once for enchanting supplies.

â€”{@linkcreature:63#1160})

A good soldier like you understands the value of a good weapon, but sometimes it's smarter to enchant your existing weapon rather than trade it in for a new one.

Speak with {@linkcreature:63#1605} in the Creation Workshop to learn more.

Don't forget alkahest. You should buy 20 of the tier 3 alkahest before you see him. Mukhem in Boreas Alley sells them.

Dougal told me you'd stop by. I can smell the alkahest, so it looks like you're all set.

Ready to learn about enchanting equipment?
I can't teach you to enchant equipment without alkahest. Buy some from {@linkcreature:63#1103}. They're not that expensive.
